resources.string: « La chance n'est pas de notre côté pour l'instant. Vous ne figuriez pas dans le manifeste. »

C'est vraiment dommage. J'espérais vraiment en savoir plus sur mon passé. Je n'ai pas non plus eu de chance avec Niki Andris à la colonie. \n\nAvec un peu de chance, le second vaisseau contient plus d'informations sur mon passé.
“What is Springtide Bloom?”
A celebration of nature, when the Wispyblooms appear on Aeternum. \n\nIt’s when we can harmonize with the rhythms of the world and achieve peace and harmony.
“How does that help me?”

Il est aussi libérateur que bénéfique de s'unir aux esprits de la nature. Cela protège votre âme et votre esprit. \n\nImaginez une vie sans crainte de l'altération ou de rejoindre les dévoyés. La liberté est une bénédiction.
“And a flower grants me this?”
The mysteries of the Wispybloom must be studied and understood. As the Bloom Herald, I seek to guide others to these truths. \n\nWe should all marvel at the ethereal beauty surrounding us.
“Who are the Children of Bloom?”
We are anyone who wishes to seek the truth, to achieve peace and harmony. \n\nOur home is nature, our language is love, our sustenance is truth. We are all siblings of the Bloom.
“You seem oddly happy.”
Would you not be happy knowing such bliss? Would you not laugh, dance, and sing surrounded by such beauty? \n\nWe want everyone to share what we experience.
“What exactly is a Wispy Wasp?”

Un insecte des plus curieux. Elles n'apparaissent qu'à l'éclosion des floraisons vaporeuses. \n\nElles en collectent le nectar magique, bien que nous ignorons à quelles fins. Elles protègent les fleurs et sont très dangereuses.
“Uh, who exactly are ‘The Folk?’”
They are the soul of nature, the heart of the earth, the voice of fate. \n\nThey are as powerful as the elements and as old as the stars.
“And they’re here now?”
They are everywhere, they are everything. \n\nSurely you heard their voices, glimpsed their beauty, their truth.
“I did see… something.”
You are a Child of Bloom now. \n\nDance, sing, laugh, for true freedom is now yours…
